data_type: personally identifiable aggregate statistic regard user behavior
text: We may disclose non-personally identifiable aggregated statistics regarding user behavior as a measure of interest in and use of our Website and email to third parties in the form of aggregated data, such as overall patterns or demographic reports that do not describe or identify any individual user.
We also use Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption when transmitting sensitive information.
